name: sporty photographer hat
notes:
[the photographer hat][1] was originally designed in worsted weight yarn and has been my go to slouch hat pattern for years. i wanted a lighter weight version so now it’s available in sport weight yarn too. it’s a simple hat that is great for guys, gals, and all our other pals!

**sizes**
s/m 18 1/2” x 11” (46.9 x 27.9cm), l/xl 20” x 12” (50.8 x 30.4cm)
this hat is very stretchy and you will want around 2-4” (5-10.1cm) negative ease.

**materials**
190, 250 yards (174, 228 meters) sport weight yarn.
(sample knit in spincycle yarns - dyed in the wool.) 
us 2 16” (2.75 mm 40cm) circular needles. 
us 4 16" (3.5 mm 40cm) circular needles. 
us 4 (3.5 mm) dpns.
1 stitch marker.

**gauge**
24 stitches and 36 rows = 4" (10 cm) in stockinette stitch on us 4 (3.5 mm) or size needed to obtain gauge.


  [1]: https://www.ravelry.com/patterns/library/the-photographer-hat
